name: Ext_R5_SpecimenDefinition_ty_co_ad_additive
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SpecimenDefinition.typeTested.container.additive.additive[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SpecimenDefinition.typeTested.container.additive.additive[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SpecimenDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Substance introduced in the kind of container to preserve, maintain or enhance the specimen. Examples: Formalin, Citrate, EDTA.
element.comment: `SpecimenDefinition.typeTested.container.additive.additive[x]` maps to R4B `SpecimenDefinition.typeTested.container.additive.additive[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Substance introduced in the kind of container to preserve, maintain or enhance the specimen. Examples: Formalin, Citrate, EDTA.
element.comment: `SpecimenDefinition.typeTested.container.additive.additive[x]` maps to R4B `SpecimenDefinition.typeTested.container.additive.additive[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubstanceDefinition)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
